1.0.name: wordpress/wp-sportnews
1.0.description:
This Widget Plugin enables you to display Sportgate News Feeds on your WordPress website without knowing anything about the format of the feeds. Just select from a preset list of categories which feed you want to have displayed and customize its appearance as you like inside the boundaries of Sportgate's presentation options.

  • You can have up to 20 widgets with up to 20 items per feed.
  • Change the title of each widget to something more pleasing if you like.
  • Display news item titles only or title and short description, click title to go directly to the associated Sportgate news article.

It is an adapted version of the KB Advanced RSS Widget by Adam R. Brown.
